A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was a great movie in terms of checking things of with a critic but the thing that lets this movie down for me is the direction they take the characters. I personally didn't like where they went with Rey\, Luke and Snoke. The first shock from the twists takes a while to sink in and after it does you decide weather you like it or not. I decided I did not. I really enjoyed Leia\, Kylo and Poe in this movie however\, as I thought they had the best character development and most interesting stories and I also thought the direction the characters where taken in was far better than some others. Overall if you are a hardcore Star Wars fan YOU NEED TO SEE THIS MOVIE\, but if you're not then don't stress about it\, just avoid spoilers as it could ruin your whole viewing experience.
